Container.Name: MineOS-node
Container.Overview: MineOS is a server front-end to ease managing Minecraft administrative tasks. This iteration using Node.js aims to enhance previous MineOS scripts (Python-based), by leveraging the event-triggering, asyncronous model of Node.JS and websockets.[br] [br] This allows the front-end to provide system health, disk and memory usage, and logging in real-time. [br] Default Username: mc[br] Default password: mypass[br] Please change your password[br] [br] Default configuration:[br] Web Port: 8443[br] Dynmap Port: 8125[br] Minecraft Ports (10 by default): 25565-25575[br] Container Path: /var/games/minecraft[br] Storage Path (optional for faster server back-ups if using plugins like dynmap): /mnt/data [br] Ubuntu, latest commit By Hexparrot
